system.descriptionText:
Mutants of ancient noble lines, whose third eyes allow them to pilot vessels through the warp.
Skills: Common Lore (Navis Nobilite), Forbidden Lore (Navigators, Warp), Literacy, Navigation (Stellar, Warp), Psyniscience, Scholastic Lore (Astromancy), Speak Language (High Gothic, Low Gothic)
Talents: Navigator, Pistol Weapon Training (Universal)
Gear: Best Hellpistol or Good Hand-cannon, Best Metal Staff, Best Xeno-mesh Armour, Emperor's Tarot deck, Silk Headscarf, Nobilite Robes, Charm, Micro-bead.
Special Ability: Warp Eye: Start with Warp Eye Navigator Power and one other Navigator Power. Gain boons and mutations based upon the Navigator's Lineage. (See Psychic Powers Page)
